I am a consumer and trump understands the consumer. My buying power has fallen below my parents and grandparents. We are in debt up to our eyes. Trump understands and is not liked by either the RNC or The DNC so fight for us Trump. And we will fight for you.

There isn't life after death. because your bible teaches you this does not necessarily constitute reality. Most religions are culture based, hence most Christians cannot specify why they follow in that faith other than they were born into believing a fictional story written by """"who knows"""" and edited by king James et al...to suite the reader. How different are you from other animals that walk this earth? Same animals that you hunt down and kill to satisfy your thirst and hunger...same animals that share most anatomical composition as we humans, and you tell me those animals are not worthy of your heaven? Smh

Besides, let's be honest here...Not many people marry anymore with the genuine intent to preserve their relationship and honor each other above all else. I've been married twice. First time was a mistake because we had nothing in common. Second time was a whirlwind and when it was good it was really good, but I found out way too late when I was most vulnerable that she had no intention of taking any responsibility for our marriage, but she had every intention of taking as much property and money as she could. And yes, I know, don't let my cynicism ruin anyone else's dream...I just think it's a good idea to be smart. Though if you have to consider a prenup, you probably shouldn't be getting married anyway.
